body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. An opponent has Wall of Denial in play (it has shroud).
2. Cast Faceless Butcher, which as an effect of "when comes to play, exile target creature" What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Wall of Denial, having shroud, should not be offered as a target for the effect. It is, and when chosen, is in fact removed from the game. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.23 on WinXP
author: [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/)
title: A creature with shroud is offered as target for Faceless Butcher's effect.

comments.body:
This issue was closed by revision 2118f7d61b9a .

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)

comments.body:
Thanks for the report.
I made this and a few other cards to be a targeted effect.

content:
_From [i...@tandetnik.org](https://code.google.com/u/100964988663965718405/) on March 19, 2012 10:47:20_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. An opponent has Wall of Denial in play (it has shroud).
2. Cast Faceless Butcher, which as an effect of "when comes to play, exile target creature" What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Wall of Denial, having shroud, should not be offered as a target for the effect. It is, and when chosen, is in fact removed from the game. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Magarena 1.23 on WinXP

**Attachment:** [faceless-butcher.PNG](http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=192)

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=192_
